---
title: "protocol_31"
---

Protocol_31.m  - 60deg and 15 deg gratings - 4 different speeds
Based on protocol 27 and protocol 10
Includes:
- off background interval - pattern 47
20s interval
30s trial duration - 2x trials
stationary bars = 60s only one position

## Protocol Parameters

| Parameter | Value |
|:----------|:------|
| Conditions | 10 |
| Patterns Used | 8 |
| t_acclim_start | 300s |
| t_acclim_end | 30s |
| t_interval | 20s |
| t_flash | 5s |
| t_pause | 0.01 |


## Conditions

| # | Pattern | Speed | Duration | Description |
|--:|:--------|------:|---------:|:------------|
| 1 | [Pattern 9](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_09.qmd) | 32 | 15s | 60 deg gratings - 1Hz - 1 px step pattern |
| 2 | [Pattern 9](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_09.qmd) | 64 | 15s | 60 deg gratings - 2Hz - 1 px step pattern |
| 3 | [Pattern 9](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_09.qmd) | 127 | 15s | 60 deg gratings - 4Hz - 1 px step pattern |
| 4 | [Pattern 27](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_27.qmd) | 127 | 15s | 60 deg gratings - 8Hz - 2px step pattern |
| 5 | [Pattern 10](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_10.qmd) | 8 | 15s | 60 deg gratings - Flicker - 4Hz |
| 6 | [Pattern 4](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_04.qmd) | 32 | 15s | 15 deg gratings - 4Hz - 1 px step pattern |
| 7 | [Pattern 4](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_04.qmd) | 64 | 15s | 15 deg gratings - 8Hz - 1 px step pattern |
| 8 | [Pattern 4](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_04.qmd) | 127 | 15s | 15 deg gratings - 16Hz - 1 px step pattern |
| 9 | [Pattern 63](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_63.qmd) | 127 | 15s | 15 deg gratings - 32Hz - 2px step pattern |
| 10 | [Pattern 5](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_05.qmd) | 8 | 15s | 15 deg gratings - Flicker - 4Hz |
